alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Lee; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Moore, southeastern Randolph, northwestern Lee and western Chatham Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Siler City to 10 miles southeast of Seagrove. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsboro, Carthage, Siler City, Goldston, Robbins, Bynum, Cumnock, Harpers Crossroads, Highfalls and Coleridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
